shows.title: Kizzy Crawford
shows.desc: A multi-talented multi-instrumentalist with a fresh, expressive voice recalling Katie Melua and Corinne Bailey Rae, Kizzy uses loops to create a kind of soul-folk-jazz, with lyrics in both Welsh and English. She’s graced stages at Glastonbury and Blissfields, had airplay all over the place, and some of her songs have even been used in an A-level Music syllabus.
